data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skoracki, Maciej, Hendricks, Sarah A., Spicer, Greg S. (2011): Systematics of the genus Syringophilopsis Kethley, 1970 (Acari: Prostigmata: Syringophilidae) with description of three new species from North American passerines. Zootaxa 2793: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205181
